flawed_nl_solution:
Lake Crystal has twenty percent fewer frogs than Lassie Lake, a total of 20/100*45=<<20/100*45=225/1>>225/1 frogs
The total number of frogs in Lake Crystal is 45-225/1=<<45-225/1=-180>>-180
Together, the two lakes have -180+45=<<-180+45=-135>>-135 frogs

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 225/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
